content: in ea of 1st 2 dcs single_crochet into any single_crochet of round 9 below single_crochet in nxt 2 dcs of round 11 skip 1 single_crochet in round 9 single_crochet into nxt single_crochet in round 9 repeat 144 ���� black single_crochet in 1st 4 sts single_crochet 2tog repeat 120 ���� black double_crochet around 120 ���� black double_crochet around 120 ���� black double_crochet around 120 fasten_off and weave in ends cut off a piece of the black yarn and weave through each stitch of row 16 going front to back back to front put the cover on the trivet and pull tight securing with a double bow hide the bow under the cover done
